level.heading: Rules and regulations.
level.text: The Commissioner shall have authority to make and enforce such reasonable rules and regulations as may be necessary in making effective the provisions of this chapter, but such rules and regulations shall not be contrary to nor inconsistent with the provisions of this chapter.

level.heading: Legislative History of Laws
level.text: For legislative history of D.C. Law 11-268, see Historical and Statutory Notes following § 31-1201.03.

level.heading: Miscellaneous Notes
level.text: Department of Insurance abolished: See Historical and Statutory Notes following § 31-2501.03.
